title: Wildes Italien
overview: Italy is not without reason one of the world's most popular holiday destinations.  Yet its fascinating wildlife remains largely unknown: wolves and brown bears in the forests of Northern Italy, flamingos in the Po delta and dolphins off the coast of Sicily.  Stunning time-lapse and slow-motion footage show the country's flora and fauna in a completely new light and landscapes unfold impressively in majestic aerial photography.  This two-part documentary sets itself apart from others of its kind, with spectacular pictures capturing the unique light and atmosphere of Italy.
